scripts.test:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npx mocha tests/testCases.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options enableCode=false --timeout 30000
scripts.test:uat: cross-envNODE_ENV=uat npx mocha tests/testCases.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options enableCode=false --timeout 30000
scripts.test:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npx mocha tests/testCases.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options enableCode=false --timeout 30000
